model.map

Class MapGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.map.MapGenerator

  • public class MapGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Generates a map based upon a 2D heightmap. The algorithm used for generation is explained in detail here.
    Author:
    Christopher

    • Method Detail

      • generateMap

        public static Cell[][] generateMap(int rows,
                   int cols,
                   int waterBorder)
        Generates a two-dimensional heightmap and lays it out with terrain
        Parameters:
        rows - The number of rows in the map
        cols - The number of columsn in the map
        waterBorder - The number of rows/columns on the outer border automatically set to water
        Returns:
        The map generated by the 2D heightmap
